original_text: During this time, the leaders in Judah were sending letters to Tobiah. Tobiah was also sending his replies to them.
korean_text: 또한 그 때에 유다의 귀족들이 여러 번 도비야에게 편지하였고 도비야의 편지도 그들에게 이르렀으니

sentences.original_text: Tobiah was also sending his replies to them
sentences.korean_translation: 도비야 또한 그들에게 회신을 보내고 있었다
